summary: Shakespeare's comedy of gender confusion, in which a girl disguises herself as a man to be near the count she adores, only to be pursued by the woman he loves.
cast: Imogen Stubbs|Steven Mackintosh|Nicholas Farrell|Sidney Livingstone|Ben Kingsley|James Walker|Helena Bonham Carter|Nigel Hawthorne|Mel Smith|Imelda Staunton|Toby Stephens|Alan Mitchell|Peter Gunn|Richard E. Grant|Tim Bentinck|Rod Culbertson|Jeff Hall|David Burke
title: Noche de reyes
